title: Emerald Lakshmi Kasu Haaram - Timeless Elegance
materials: Burmese Rubies (కెంపు రాళ్ళు). Features Hyderabadi Polish for enduring lustre.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic Lakshmi Kasu design interspersed with peacock (నెమలి) motifs, a symbol of beauty and prosperity. The statement Zambian Emerald drops are framed by Polki diamonds set in a closed setting, highlighting their intense color. The pendant features delicate engravings reminiscent of temple jewellery, lending it a regal touch. The Polki diamonds feature intricate detailing enhancing their brilliance.
colors: with vibrant green from the emeralds
flashes of red from the rubies
and a warm white from the Polki diamonds. The antique gold finish accentuates the traditional aesthetic.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. This Haaram adds an element of timeless elegance to any traditional attire
making it suitable for modern parties and upscale events as well.
description: This Haaram is a stunning fusion of tradition and contemporary design. The use of high-quality Zambian Emeralds and uncut Polki diamonds, combined with skilled craftsmanship, ensures a heirloom-worthy piece. Lakshmi Kasu design is a symbol of wealth and prosperity, making it an auspicious addition to your jewellery collection. The durable Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting beauty. A true investment in style and cultural heritage.
